original_text: And Moses commanded the people of Israel according to the word of the Lord, saying, “The tribe of the people of Joseph is right.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와의 말씀으로 이스라엘 자손에게 명령하여 이르되 요셉 자손 지파의 말이 옳도다

sentences.original_text: And Moses commanded the people of Israel
according to the word of the Lord
The tribe of the people of Joseph is right.
